Stakeholder	 recommendation AEGON’s	 response
Address what AEGON wants to achieve with this report. AEGON has included a message from the company’s 
global Head of Sustainability, which specifically 
addresses our objectives for this report. Please see 
page 11  to read the message. 
Make the report more concise and attractive. Alongside this Sustainability Report, AEGON has 
decided to publish a shorter version as both a summary 
and as part of its 2010 Annual Review. This shorter 
version is available as a separate document at  
www.aegoncorporatereporting.com .
Integrated reporting is an interesting option and a 
necessity in the future*.AEGON is closely monitoring developments with regard 
to integrated reporting. In principle, the company is in 
favor, though a practical framework for integrated 
reporting has still to be developed. 
Include a clear overview with concrete and challenging 
objectives and a timeline.AEGON has included an overview of the company’s 
sustainability objectives by stakeholder group in this 
report. For more information, please see pages 2-4 . 
AEGON has been promising a company-wide 
investment policy for some time and should act quickly 
to implement one. In January 2011, AEGON signed up to the United 
Nations Principles for Responsible Investment. This is a 
first step towards a more integrated, company-wide 
approach to this issue. Responsible investment is, 
however, a complex area and work on this approach 
has taken longer than AEGON initially expected. For 
more details, please see page 85 . 
* A specific question on integrated reporting was included in the review.
Other remarks
Positive Negative
Report is comprehensive and contains a lot of useful 
information.Report should be more ambitious.
Structure of the report is clear and well written. Purpose of the report or what AEGON wishes to 
achieve with the report is not clear.
AEGON has done more to include specific targets. Length of the report makes it inaccessible to many 
readers.
Dilemmas are addressed and case studies included. Targets are not always connected to AEGON’s business 
and are sometimes unclear about the time frame.
Report is in line with stakeholders’ perceptions 
of AEGON.
